added: Initial release with basic functionality to view upcoming trains for a specific station.
Added a new feature to see how much time a train will be staying at a station.
Added searching suggestion for the station search bar.
Auto-detect nearest station based on user's location. (Works better on mobile devices)
fixed: Fixed path for JSON file in index.js

added: Added a filter to show only the train with a specific destination or line.
Added a popup to show the last update of the project automatically
Added a changelog to the README.md file.
fixed: Improved searching engine (previously when searching for "Argenteuil" it would search for "Val d'Argenteuil" instead of "Argenteuil")
